de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection

Interface ImvConnectionContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed, ImConnectionContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultImvConnectionContext

    public interface ImvConnectionContext
extends ImConnectionContext
    Generic IMV connection context.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRecommendation(long id, de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.ImvRecommendationPair recommendationPair)
      Adds a recommendation of an IMV with the given ID to the context for the overall result of an integrity check handshake.
      Map<Long,de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.ImvRecommendationPair> clearRecommendations()
      Returns all recommendations, which were added to the context and clears the context recommendation buffer.

      • Methods inherited from interface de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection.ImConnectionContext

        addMessage, clearMessage, invalidate, isValid, requestHandshakeRetry, validate

      • Methods inherited from interface de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed

    • Method Detail

      • addRecommendation

        void addRecommendation(long id,
                     de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.ImvRecommendationPair recommendationPair)
                       throws de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException
        Adds a recommendation of an IMV with the given ID to the context for the overall result of an integrity check handshake.
        Parameters:
        id - the IMV ID
        recommendationPair - the recommendation pair
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if recommendation cannot be added to the context

      • clearRecommendations

        Map<Long,de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.ImvRecommendationPair> clearRecommendations()
        Returns all recommendations, which were added to the context and clears the context recommendation buffer.
        Returns:
        a map of recommendations (key:IMV ID, value:recommendation)
